column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////It was my first time here. We had a really wonderful time. Has a very modern Vibe. What stands out from a food stand point would maybe be the short ribs and the okra. From a service and point
column2: it would be that within a short period of time from when my clock napkin fell off my side to the floor
column3: one of the staff came and picked it up and handed it back to me.
